Getting the ownCloud iOS App
To get the ownCloud iOS App, point Safari, or your favorite web browser, to your ownCloud server. Links to ownCloud’s mobile apps.

Next, log in and navigate to
Settings
General (Personal)
.
At the bottom of that page, you will see a link to the ownCloud app on iTunes.
You’ll also find links and information on the ownCloud installation page.
